DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to study the effects of a multicomponent lifestyle intervention that includes partial meal replacements as a means to prevent excessive gestational weight gain in obese women. The primary hypothesis is that the intervention will reduce the rate of gestational weight gain compared with standard care.
DOC.brief_title: Preventing Excessive Gestational Weight Gain in Obese Women
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criteria: Over 18 years old < 16 weeks gestation BMI >= 25 Willing to consent Pregnant with Twins Untreated medical or psychological problem Inability to be physically active
